properties.entry: INSERT INTO PLACE ( PLACE_NO, PLACE_CATEGORY_NO, LOCAL_CATEGORY_NO, PLACE_NAME, PLACE_ADDRESS, PLACE_PHONE, PLACE_TIMES, PLACE_URL, PLACE_INFO, PLACE_AROUND, PLACE_PRICE, PLCAE_CAUTION, PLACE_MAP, MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( PLACE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )

INSERT INTO PLACE_FILE ( PLACE_FILE_NO, PLACE_NO, PLACE_FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, PLACE_FILE_CHANGE_NAME, PLACE_FIKE_PATH, PLACE_FILE_LEVEL, PLACE_FILE_UPLOAD_DATE ) VALUES ( PLACE_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, PLACE_SEQ.CURRVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE )
